content.text:
# Draft:William King Ponsell

W. K. Ponsell and Ponsell
William King Ponsell was a state legislator in Georgia. He served in the Georgia Senate.
He was married to Nora Ivy Chapman Ponsell.
See also
*List of former members of the Georgia State Senate
